job.title: Data Scientist - Strategy & Analytics
job.description: ltpgtTikTok is the leading destination for shortform mobile video Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtOur US Safety team provides key support for TikToks innovative initiatives stateoftheart products and integrated platforms servicing our US market As a Data Scientist on TikToks US Safety team you will be instrumental in ensuring that TikTok remains a safe trustworthy and riskfree environment to create and enjoy content across all of our apps while protecting our brand The ideal candidate will have a background in a technical field will have experience working with large production data sets and will have some experience delivering data products on a fastpaced team ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis position will be fulltime and will be based in our Los Angeles CA locationltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtResponsibilitiesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt Partner with product operations policy and engineering teams to scope design execute measure and improve the impact of US Safety efforts on the US TikTok businessltpgtltpgt Lead complex data analysis to develop track and maintain key metrics to ensure alignment across stakeholdersltpgtltpgt Collaborate with data teams across the globe to form best practices regarding data modeling and visualizationltpgtltpgt Leverage data mining model development statistical and regression techniques Have an understanding of when to use these various methodologies based on the scope size and nuances of the problemltpgtltpgt Acquire new data from various production systems and databases Have an understanding of ETL frameworkltpgtltpgtQualificationsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtBasic Qualificationsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt 2 years of experience in data science data analytics or quantitative analysisltpgtltpgt Expert background in utilizing SQLPython to extract manipulate and analyze datasetsltpgtltpgt Experience building data infrastructure designing data architecture building data pipelines implementing scalable monitoring and implementing reporting solutionsltpgtltpgt Experience with at least one data visualization tool eg TableauMode AnalyticsLookeretcltpgtltpgt Experience with data modeling and statistical analysis techniques including hypothesis testing model evaluation and common regression and classification algorithmsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtPreferred qualifications ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt Experience working with international partners in different time zonesltpgtltpgt Curiosity and strong motivation to dissect a highly complex challenge capability to thrive in a dynamic environmentltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtEEODampampI StatementltpgtltpgtTikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills experiences and unique perspectives Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace At TikTok our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy To achieve that goal we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach We believe individuals shouldnt be disadvantaged because of their background or identity but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience We are passionate about this and hope you are tooltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtTikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process If you need assistance or an accommodation please reach out to us at RecruitingCorptiktokcomltpgt
